content.text:
# Masked Republic

Masked Republic is a website and media company that specializes in Lucha libre (Mexican-style professional wrestling) merchandise, ranging from wrestling masks, toys, clothes and comic books. It is the largest seller of lucha libre related products and has also created its own wrestling Pay-per-views. The company also has a charity division. It is run by founder and CEO Ruben Zamora, and President and COO Kevin Kleinrock.
